sentences.en: Money lies at the heart of the debate over airline safety.
sentences.cn: 资金是空运安全争论中的实质问题。

sentences.en: Permission has not yet been granted for the airline to overfly Tanzania.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司还未获得飞越坦桑尼亚领空的许可。

sentences.en: That deal would create, in effect, the world's biggest airline.
sentences.cn: 这一协议将促成世界最大航空公司的成立。

sentences.en: The £85m programme will involve an extensive rebranding of the airline.
sentences.cn: 这个8,500万英镑的项目将包括全面重塑该航空公司的形象。

sentences.en: The airline had losses of $35m and was bailed out by Qantas.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司亏损达3,500万美元，而澳航出资帮助其摆脱了困境。

sentences.en: The airline industry has charged the oil companies with price gouging.
sentences.cn: 航空业指责石油公司漫天要价。

sentences.en: The airline plans to auction its international routes to former competitors.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司打算把他们的国际线路拍卖给以前的竞争对手。

sentences.en: The airline rose like a phoenix from the ashes.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司又起死回生了.

sentences.en: The airline was accused of playing Russian roulette with passenger safety.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司被指责将乘客安全当儿戏。

sentences.en: The airline's crew refuelled the plane.
sentences.cn: 航空公司的机务人员给飞机加了油。

sentences.en: the current downswing in the airline industry
sentences.cn: 航空业目前的滑坡状况

sentences.en: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.cn: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.en: The weather played havoc with airline schedules.
sentences.cn: 天气打乱了航空公司的航班安排。

sentences.en: There was some bloke on the phone waffling about an airline ticket.
sentences.cn: 电话里有个家伙在唠叨一张飞机票的事情。

sentences.en: This year the airline will be hard-pressed to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 今年该航空公司将很难赢利。

phrases.tran_cn: 国际航线，国际航空公司
联合航空公司（美国一家航空公司）

trans.tran_en: a company that takes passengers and goods to different places by plane
